title: 怎样才能让地皮没有动物和怪物
author: Mai_Pian

replies.author: pipa_dada
replies.txt_content:
先用/killall杀了除玩家外所有的生物
然后输入禁止生物刷新指令/gamerule doMobSpawning false

replies.author: huwei5201314789
replies.txt_content:
直接用多世界插件禁止就行了如果是MW多世界插件的话，应该也差不了多远。。
dipi:   ###这个是世界名
    ==: MVWorld
    hidden: 'false'
    alias: "&a[\u4f4f\u5b85\u5c0f\u533a]"
    color: WHITE
    style: NORMAL
    pvp: 'false'
    scale: '1.0'
    respawnWorld: ''
    allowWeather: 'true'
    difficulty: EASY
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'  ###这个是禁止生成动物
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'  ###这个是禁止生成怪物
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
    entryfee:
      ==: MVEntryFee
      amount: '0.0'
      currency: '-1'
    hunger: 'true'
    autoHeal: 'true'
    adjustSpawn: 'true'
    portalForm: ALL
    gameMode: SURVIVAL
    keepSpawnInMemory: 'false'
    spawnLocation:
      ==: MVSpawnLocation
      x: 1.0854013883332891
      y: 65.0
      z: 0.1288481274799086
      pitch: -5.162266
      yaw: 358.25586
    autoLoad: 'true'
    bedRespawn: 'true'
    worldBlacklist: []
    environment: NORMAL
    seed: '1151269971463270428'
    generator: PlotMe-DefaultGenerator
    playerLimit: '-1'
    allowFlight: 'true'复制代码

replies.author: xiao_sha_bi
replies.txt_content: 有多世界插件直接在那个世界输入/mv modify set diff 0
